form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Tester (for himself, Mr. Chambliss, Mr. Begich, Mr. Blumenthal, Mr. Wyden, Ms. Klobuchar, Ms. Landrieu, and Mr. Baucus) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to modify the per-fiscal year calculation of days of certain active duty or active service used to reduce the minimum age at which a member of a reserve component of the uniformed services may retire for non-regular service.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Reserve Retirement Deployment Credit Correction Act .

section.header: Modification of per-fiscal year calculation of days of certain active duty or active service to reduce eligibility age for retirement for non-regular service

subsection.header: Accumulation of 90-Day periods of service within any two consecutive fiscal years
subsection.text: Section 12731(f)(2)(A) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by striking in any fiscal year and inserting in any two consecutive fiscal years.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall take effect as of January 28, 2008, and as if included in the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2008 (Public Law 110â€“181) as enacted.
